title: FEATURE JOBS: Hummingbird, Sunnylife, BEAR + More
text:
Do you love social media and interacting with others? Why not join Hummingbird as a part of the Social Media Community & Customer Service (MELB) team? Hummingbird, a young company that launched in 2016, offer quick and healthy breakfast solutions every day via a subscription model. The successful applicant would work at growing Hummingbird’s Facebook and Instagram channels through conversation and education while also providing exceptional customer service. You will be interacting with prospective and current customers through email, social media, live chat and phone. To be considered for this role, you would need to enjoy working in a team setting, be a creative thinker and be able to juggle multiple priorities. If you have previous customer service experience and are keen to work in a fast paced environment, then apply today!

Are you a digital designer ready to take on a new challenge? Sunnylife, the world’s leading summer lifestyle brand, are looking for a full time Digital Designer (SYD) to bring creative and original ideas to work every day. The responsibilities for this role include managing the end to end creative process for weekly campaigns, translating products into engaging visual assets and managing photo and video shoots. You would need to have an advanced Diploma or Degree in Graphic Design, or Visual Communication, an intimate knowledge of Photoshop, Illustrator & InDesign plus a minimum 3 years digital design experience. Apply now if this sounds like the perfect job for you!

BEAR, a modern Australian lifestyle brand which brings together a range of wellness essentials for the modern professional, are on the look out for a full time E-commerce & Digital Manager (SYD) to work across the company’s E-commerce platform. Reporting directly to the CEO, the successful applicant would be in charge of developing, maintaining and refining BEAR’s E-commerce strategy while also managing and demonstrating performance growth on key website metrics. BEAR are seeking someone who has industry leading knowledge of eCommerce platforms and digital user experiences, who has previous experience of Shopify, Google Analytics and paid media, and has a strong work ethic. Don’t miss out on this great opportunity and apply today!

CBF reading all the above? Short and sweet gigs here:

Amelius, a fast growing Women’s clothing label, are hiring a part time Warehouse Storeperson (SYD). Apply here.

Oaktree are seeking a volunteer Community Engagement Officer (PER) to help run their biggest campaign: Live Below the Line. Apply now.

APRA AMCOS are hiring an experienced and passionate Analyst/Tester (SYD) on a part time basis. Apply today!
